EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.POL.none.N.G.N.9216.FN POL.Email 08 - A new LAN could be a game chan
EmailTemplate.subject: A new LAN could be a game changer for your organization – and your career
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Switch to Passive Optical LAN to cut costs and boost performance Some decisions in life are pretty clear. But they can still be hard to make.
Take Passive Optical LAN. You know it’s better for your organization than your traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN. Better performance, better security, and much lower costs. But replacing a faithful, 30-year old LAN technology with something new is a daunting prospect.
Nokia is here to help. We’re the trusted partner providing fiber broadband to millions of people around the world. Contact us now and we can help you make the right case for you and your stakeholders, whether it’s technical, financial or operational. Discover how easy it is to switch – and how much your stakeholders will thank you for it.
Visit our website for more details and get in touch today. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
